title: Day 25: Five more days to go
body:
Do any of you ever wish you'd bite into a syringe every time you eat a bean burrito from Taco Bell? I do. That's all I hope for these days. A syringe, a rat, a finger, ANYTHING! Taco Bell has much deeper pockets than me. That's a shame.

Today was a bad day. It seemed like everything went wrong. Our plumber showed up, but our hand sink was wrong (it's a counter sink, not the kind you can mount on the wall), and our three compartment sink was missing two legs. What the funk, man! Can it get any worse? I hope not. Oh yeah, I also slit my finger open while pulling the tub out of the prep room. Yay for that! I would have pictures, but I was too stupid to remember to bring my camera.

Man, today wasn't a good day. Good thing I finished it off by riding a mechanical bull for 10+ seconds. I'm AWESOME!
author: Dan

comments.author: justin
comments.body: I have pictures to prove it.  Dan, on a mechanical bull.  I'll post them tomorrow.

comments.author: Sam Spade
comments.body: Sweet! Maybe that's something to consider adding to the lobby.

comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: Hey - a mechanical bull, huh?  Sorry about the plumbing problems.  We have a babysitter lined up for this evening, and we are planning on swinging by the Moxie.  We're looking forward to seeing it and you.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
You guys are being included on CFP's regular First Friday map, aren't you?  I haven't seen this week's so I was just wondering...
Also, see about getting interviewed on KSMU's local Arts News feature at 10 a.m. on Fridays.  I don't think I've heard the Moxie mentioned once, but you/they just may be waiting until opening.
Sorry - you may have your thumb on all this, but I am a terrible backseat driver/theatre owner!

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Photographic evidence of Dan riding a mechanical bull last night.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
If that's "evidence" I have a blurry shot of bigfoot and some smudged lights that are UFO's to show you.  :)

I kid, I kid.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: We're not officially part of the First Friday Art Walk, so our name won't be on any of the maps. When we open we may join.

comments.author: Zach
comments.body: I guess this is a sign that the first movie the Moxie is going to feature will be "Urban Cowboy."

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body:
Dan, to read your recent posts, one would think this 30 day thing was wearing you down.

STAND STRONG! When you open the theatre and both your workload and the complaints double, it will all be worth it!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: how much do you think you could make with adsense ads on the site? it's not as lucrative as suing TB, but it might generate some flow.
